abstract: Once Facebook increases its advertising, its shares are expected to climb, but for now they are down.
snippet: Once Facebook increases its advertising, its shares are expected to climb, but for now they are down.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO — Facebook shares fell nearly 4 percent on Wednesday to $20.88 — nearly half of what they were worth when the company went public on May 17.

headline.main: Facebook’s Slide Continues Despite the Company’s Reach and the Market’s Hopes
headline.print_headline: Facebook’s Slide Continues Despite the Company’s Reach and the Market’s Hopes
